alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 8:35PM CST until March 08 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Missouri... Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Valley Park. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Valley Park. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, The south riverward side of Marshall Road begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 18.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Meramec River Valley Park 18.0 17.4 17.0 10.4 4.5 3.4 2.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
